name: Number Line Runner
description: Made this for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam! This is my first time posting to itch.io and my first time participating in a game jam, which probably tells you everything you need to know about the quality of the game itself. The idea for the game came from only having one dimension, here the player and all the obstacles are limited to a flat number line, only by using various abilities scattered throughout the game will you be able to get past them.
